languages.text: "Он осмелился угрожать вам и обещал, что за каждого {d|Encyclopedia:NemesiteExploitsHardWay}погибшего{/d} серфа из литейного отсека умрет трое уроженцев верхних палуб. Подлое отродье!"
"He dared to threaten you and promised that for every {d|Encyclopedia:NemesiteExploitsHardWay}dead{/d} serf from the foundry bay, three occupants of the upper decks would perish. Despicable villain!"
languages.original_text: "Он осмелился угрожать вам и обещал, что за каждого {d|Encyclopedia:NemesiteExploitsHardWay}погибшего{/d} серфа из литейного отсека умрет трое уроженцев верхних палуб. Подлое отродье!"

traits.locale_text: "He dared to threaten you and promised that for every dead serf from the foundry bay, three natives of the upper decks would perish. What a despicable character!"
"He dared to threaten you and promised that for every dead serf from the foundry bay, three natives of the upper decks would perish. What a despicable character!"
"He dared to threaten you and promised that for every dead serf from the foundry bay, three occupents of the upper decks would perish. Despicable villain!"
"He dared to threaten you and promised that for every dead serf from the foundry bay, three occupents of the upper decks would perish. Despicable villain!"
"He dared to threaten you and promised that for every {d|Encyclopedia:NemesiteExploitsHardWay}dead{/d} serf from the foundry bay, three occupants of the upper decks would perish. Despicable villain!"
"He dared to threaten you and promised that for every {d|Encyclopedia:NemesiteExploitsHardWay}dead{/d} serf from the foundry bay, three occupants of the upper decks would perish. Despicable villain!"

languages.text: "Er hat es gewagt, Euch zu drohen, und versprochen, dass für jeden {d|Encyclopedia:NemesiteExploitsHardWay}toten{/d} Leibeigenen in der Gießereibucht drei Bewohner der oberen Decks sterben würden. Verachtenswerter Schurke!"
languages.original_text: "He dared to threaten you and promised that for every {d|Encyclopedia:NemesiteExploitsHardWay}dead{/d} serf from the foundry bay, three occupants of the upper decks would perish. Despicable villain!"

traits.locale_text: "Er hat es gewagt, Euch zu drohen, und versprochen, dass für jeden toten Leibeigenen in der Gießereibucht drei Bewohner der oberen Decks sterben würden. Verachtenswerter Schurke!"
"Er hat es gewagt, Euch zu drohen, und versprochen, dass für jeden toten Leibeigenen in der Gießereibucht drei Bewohner der oberen Decks sterben würden. Verachtenswerter Schurke!"

languages.text: «Osó amenazarle y prometió matar a tres ocupantes de las cubiertas superiores por cada siervo {d|Encyclopedia:NemesiteExploitsHardWay}perecido{/d} en la fundición. ¡Despreciable villano!».
languages.original_text: "He dared to threaten you and promised that for every {d|Encyclopedia:NemesiteExploitsHardWay}dead{/d} serf from the foundry bay, three occupants of the upper decks would perish. Despicable villain!"

traits.locale_text: «Osó amenazarle y prometió matar a tres ocupantes de las cubiertas superiores por cada siervo perecido en la fundición. ¡Despreciable villano!».

languages.text: 「彼はあえてあなたを脅し、鋳造ベイの農奴が1{d|Encyclopedia:NemesiteExploitsHardWay}人死ぬごと{/d}に上層デッキの者が3人死ぬと言ってきた。卑劣な悪党め！」
languages.original_text: "He dared to threaten you and promised that for every {d|Encyclopedia:NemesiteExploitsHardWay}dead{/d} serf from the foundry bay, three occupants of the upper decks would perish. Despicable villain!"

traits.locale_text: 「彼はあえてあなたを脅し、鋳造ベイの農奴が1人死ぬごとに上層デッキの者が3人死ぬと言ってきた。卑劣な悪党め！」

languages.text: “他竟敢威胁您，居然还发誓说，铸造甲板每{d|Encyclopedia:NemesiteExploitsHardWay}死{/d}一个仆役，都要用上层甲板的三个人来抵命。那个卑鄙的恶棍！”
languages.original_text: "He dared to threaten you and promised that for every {d|Encyclopedia:NemesiteExploitsHardWay}dead{/d} serf from the foundry bay, three occupants of the upper decks would perish. Despicable villain!"

traits.locale_text: “他竟敢威胁您，居然还发誓说，铸造甲板每死一个仆役，都要用上层甲板的三个人来抵命。那个卑鄙的恶棍！”

languages.text: « Cette brute sanguinaire a osé vous menacer et il a juré que pour chaque serf de la fonderie retrouvé {d|Encyclopedia:NemesiteExploitsHardWay}mort{/d}, trois occupants des ponts supérieurs seraient sacrifiés. »
languages.original_text: "He dared to threaten you and promised that for every {d|Encyclopedia:NemesiteExploitsHardWay}dead{/d} serf from the foundry bay, three occupants of the upper decks would perish. Despicable villain!"

traits.locale_text: « Cette brute sanguinaire a osé vous menacer et il a juré que pour chaque serf de la fonderie retrouvé mort, trois occupants des ponts supérieurs seraient sacrifiés. »
« Cette brute sanguinaire a osé vous menacer et il a juré que pour chaque serf de la fonderie retrouvé mort, trois occupants des ponts supérieurs seraient sacrifiés. »

languages.text: "Dökümhane bölmesinde bulduğu her {d|Encyclopedia:NemesiteExploitsHardWay}ölü{/d} köle için üst güvertelerde yaşayan üç kişinin yok olacağını söyleyerek sizi tehdit etme gafletinde bulundu. Alçak garabet!"
languages.original_text: "He dared to threaten you and promised that for every {d|Encyclopedia:NemesiteExploitsHardWay}dead{/d} serf from the foundry bay, three occupants of the upper decks would perish. Despicable villain!"
